form.name: convulsion
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Newborn Emergency> Convulsion

field.name: Refer mother and baby to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Support the baby’s head with a pillow or your hand, and turn baby to one side
Make sure to keep the baby warm
If convulsions stop, and baby can feed, help the mother to breastfeed
If convulsions stop, and baby cannot breastfeed, give small sips of expressed breast milk that has been collected in a clean container with a lid
Discourage mother from giving any herbal medication
Teach mother how to keep the baby warm on the way to the health facility
Record baby’s clinical information in client’s maternal health or “Red” book. If possible, also fill out referral form
Accompany mother and baby, and have a family member accompany mother and baby to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
